post.body: Right. Thanks!
Okay, I see. But why when Twitter Search does all that more easily? :) #journchat
Yeah, now we're both a little scared :)
Yeah but that doesn't show anything even remotely recent! Over 24 hours ago. #journchat
Perhaps they gather all the data, but they sure don't surface it very well. #journchat
Would be great for Google to index Twitter, but Twitter Search does an amazing job anyway. #journchat
Generally just my blog or other blogs I write for (like Techvibes). Have submitted/approved tons of photos for NowPublic though.
Of course!
Nah...I like the simple UI of Twitter Search...and tabs inside the browser :)
Hmm ic. Hope the new host works out better!
In terms of changing perspectives on social media inside the newsroom she works at.
Yeah...I for one was quite happy to have some cleaning done for me!
Second period over. At least the #Oilers are still in this one.
Dammit #Oilers! Now 2-2
Thanks for the great chat tonight everyone! #journchat
Only 2 shots for the #Oilers this period. Get it together!
Darn, don't fall apart now #Oilers...Phoenix scored. 2-1 Oilers.
Strudwick just had a fantastic fight! Well done! #Oilers
I definitely rely on Twitter Search to follow topics. #journchat
RT @PRsarahevans: @journchat takes place EVERY monday from 8-11p CST. Normally tweets come from @journchat. :) #journchat
